description.value:
The people within your organization respect and look up to you and prove to be a reliable source of intel.

Prerequisites: Manager of an organization using the leadership system (Starfinder Galaxy Exploration Manual 100).

Benefit: When in a settlement where your organization has one or more active members, you can have your organization make power checks in order to recall information relevant to the organization and to gather information. At the GMâ€™s discretion, if the settlement views you or your organization favorably, you can roll such power checks twice and take the higher result.

system.requirements: Manager of an organization using the leadership system (Starfinder Galaxy Exploration Manual 100).
